name: AARUMUGAM S S
my_business: Established in 1970, we are third-generation business entrepreneurs, specializing in the manufacturing and retailing of Brass, Stainless Steel, and Copper utensils for residences, hostels, restaurants, and catering services. Our showroom is located at Narayanavalasu, Nasiyanur Rd, Erode, while our manufacturing units are situated in Tirupur, Kumbakonam, Madurai, and Tirunelveli. With the support of our Kumbakonam unit, we produce Idols, Swamy vahanam, Gopura Kalasam, Thiruvaachi, and other metal sheet covering works for temples of any size. Leveraging our Tirupur and Madurai facilities, we can supply customised utensils and gift articles with company logos promptly and to any location. Additionally, we are proud to be an authorized distributor for Green Chef Appliances LTD.
